page.title: 13MARTIN'S SCHOOL DAY 4/7/85.
page.content: {I set off for school at 0845 and arrived at school at 0900.At 0905 we had register and did English work up to 1000. We did Maths until 1030.I then went out to play until 1045. After play we finished off our badges which we were to wear whilst doing our Domesday Work in Gildersome, New Farnley and Lower Wortley.At 1120 we went into the hall to have singing with the headmaster. At 1145 we had assembly until noon.After that we had dinner and then played outside until 1315. After play some groups went outside to do Domesday Surveys whilst others worked inside on our Domesday diaries.At 1430 we had playtime until 1440. We then went outside and played mixed cricket until hometime at 1530. My mum meets me with the car.At home we had Chicken curry for tea. I played out,watched T/V,went to bed at 2130.
